alert.note: Alert for Lower Yukon and Innoko Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 28 at 5:58AM AKST until November 29 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 inches in most areas, with up to 6 inches along the Nulato Hills. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. There is a chance of freezing rain this afternoon as well. * WHERE...Lower Yukon and Innoko Valleys. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to midnight AKST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow will develop this this morning continue into tonight. The heaviest snow will be long the Nulato Hills where 6 inches of snow is possible. From Anvik south and east snow amounts will be 4 inches. Winds increasing this morning will cause blowing snow with reduced visibility in many areas.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
